text: You know how to challenge the team. You have a clear opinion on quality and productivity. And in this way you help bring the team to a higher level.
name: Scrum Master

text: Robin is able to take responsibility for a solution. He likes to take the lead in creating a collaborative solution and then also delivers it.
name: Product Owner

text: This is a Gatsby static website hosted on Github Pages. It is built with the React framework and utilizing Graphql for the data. Lighthouse score has all factors in green.
name: Robin ten Berge
